column4: Okay, I can't figure this out. Since upgrading to Oneiric, my Unity top bar is white and many theme icons are incorrect or just not there. Anyone seen this/know how to fix/resolve it?
installing gnome-panel fixed missing icons for me. i don't know if it reinstalled anything, though.
gnome-panel appears to be installed already. There's a bunch of weird theme stuff happening to me, like my terminal backgrounds are plain gray rather than transparent
hmm, i selected gdm over lightdm...maybe something there? maybe just reinstall unity too
I'll try gdm; that's a good idea
